thread.section_title: Hotel Central Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: In the midst of Quartier Latin - yet quiet
thread.title_full: In the midst of Quartier Latin - yet quiet - Review of Hotel Central Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Achim H
title: In the midst of Quartier Latin - yet quiet
text: Hotel is centrally placed, but located in a narrow, quiet one-way street. Staff very friendly and accommodating all requests to the best of their possibilities. Breakfast is for French habits anything between rich and luxurious. Beds very comfortable. Good selection of daily newspapers in the lobby
